description.p: Creates a date from the given year, month and day.

equivalence.lhs: @match @call @function to text(x) @case @newvar y ; "-" ; @newvar m ; "-" ; @newvar d @then @call @function date(@call @function from text(y), @call @function from text(m), @call @function from text(d)) @endmatch

description.p: Creates a time-of-day (or clock time) from the given hours, minutes and seconds.

equivalence.lhs: @match @call @function to text(x) @case @newvar h ; ":" ; @newvar m ; ":" ; @newvar s @then @call @function time(@call @function from text(h), @call @function from text(m), @call @function from text(s)) @endmatch
